description: Everyone loves cookies at Christmas. Great for gifts or to leave out for Santa with a glass of milk on Christmas Eve. These cookies a packed with flavour and can be decorated anyway you like.
name: Easy Christmas Cookies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Beat butter, caster sugar and egg with electric mixer until pale and thickened. Stir in golden syrup, and then sift all remaining dry ingredients into the mixture. Mix to combine.
Knead dough on lightly floured surface until smooth. Wrap in cling wrap and refrigerate for 30 minutes.
Preheat oven to 150°C (130°C fan forced). Roll out dough to 5mm thick on baking paper. Cut out your favourite Christmas shapes. Bake for 15 minutes and then cool on trays.
